about_the_game:
Farmers’ Market is a strategy game which requires the farmer to harvest crops and sell them at the local market in a set amount of time.

When you start a new game, you will begin collecting randomly generated crops while driving your tractor. While you collect fully grown crops, others will sprout and grow, giving you more crops to collect. You can monitor the growth of the new crops on the tractor’s onboard GPS system. Each crop type has a different value. Be careful though. If you do not get your harvested crops to market in time, they will go bad and you will not collect a profit. After each round of 1 minute, 2 minutes, or 3 minutes, depending on the amount of money you have saved in the bank, you will have the option to upgrade your tractor model, drive speed, harvest time, and harvest regrowth. It is then time to head back out to the farm and grow some more crops and make some more money!

The object of this game is to see how much money you can earn and place in the bank. However, in order to make more money, you are forced to spend money to increase your production.

Put on your flannel, roll up your sleeves, and get farming! These crops aren’t going to harvest themselves. It's time to play Farmers' Market!

Each crop type has a different value. Be careful though. If you do not get your harvested crops to market in time, they will go bad and you will not collect a profit. After each round of 1 minute, 2 minutes, or 3 minutes, depending on the amount of money you have saved in the bank, you will have the option to upgrade your tractor model, drive speed, harvest time, and harvest regrowth. It is then time to head back out to the farm and grow some more crops and make some more money!

The object of this game is to see how much money you can earn and place in the bank. However, in order to make more money, you are forced to spend money to increase your production.

Put on your flannel, roll up your sleeves, and get farming! These crops aren’t going to harvest themselves. It's time to play Farmers' Market!
name: Farmers' Market

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bit
  • Processor: i5-1035G1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 2300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You get about 20 FPS hear and audio is completely broken.

  • OS: Windows 64 bit

  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: N/A MB available space

short_description: Farmers’ Market is a strategy game which requires the farmer to harvest crops and sell them at the local market in a set amount of time. After each harvest, money is gained and improvements can be made on the farm to increase production.
